detailed_events.description: LeBron James (#23 for the Lakers) drives from the right wing and scores a layup to tie the game at 80-80.
A pass from a Denver Nuggets player is deflected, and LeBron James (#23) secures the loose ball to initiate a fast break.
After securing a steal, LeBron James dribbles the length of the court and finishes with a powerful one-handed dunk on the fast break.
With the shot clock expiring, LeBron James (#23) makes a contested fadeaway jumper from the top of the key.
A Houston Rockets player drives for a layup, and LeBron James (#6) performs a chase-down block, pinning the ball against the backboard.
LeBron James catches a pass in the paint and performs a powerful two-handed dunk over a defender.
LeBron James drives into the paint from the left side and executes a strong one-handed dunk.
On a fast break, a Miami Heat player attempts a dunk, but LeBron James chases him down from behind and blocks the shot against the backboard.
A Charlotte Hornets player loses control of the ball while dribbling, and Dennis Schröder of the Lakers pokes it away from behind to start a fast break.
Following his steal, Dennis Schröder throws a pass ahead to LeBron James, who is running towards the basket. The pass leads directly to a score.
detailed_events.location: Pass from the top of the key

detailed_events.description: LeBron James catches the alley-oop pass from Dennis Schröder on the fast break and finishes with a reverse dunk.
LeBron James drives from the top of the key to the right side of the basket and scores a layup.
LeBron James pulls up in transition from well beyond the arc, near the center court logo, and sinks a deep 3-pointer.
On a broken play, a Lakers player saves the ball from going out of bounds and passes it to LeBron James on the left wing for an immediate shot.
Following a save from a teammate, LeBron James catches the ball on the left wing and immediately shoots and makes a 3-pointer.
A player in a yellow Lakers jersey drives into the paint from the right and makes a contested, off-balance layup with his left hand.
A player in a white Lakers jersey (#23, LeBron James) pulls up for a deep three-point shot from the top of the arc and makes it.
